text: I don't know how long I can sustain this
sort of waiting emotions are getting a
little raw tired this is a probate court
window and all of the probate court
windows that they would normally use for
marriage licenses our clothes and
they're closed to everyone in Mobile
County not just us we are here with our
friends that are being denied a right
and its moral support to be here when
someone starts to get a little upset and
just give them a hug and say you know
it's alright cuz we're all here these
wonderful people just show up they have
an arm full of food and I say here thank
you so much oh you're welcome for being
sustained by strangers and it's
wonderful the moment we get legally
married I know I'm gonna be crying tears
of joy it's something I've waited my
whole life for it validates who I am and
yes we could go to those other counties
and get a marriage license but no this
is home this is where we want to get
married and we should be able to because
that is the law at this moment in time
we're in this now you know we're in all
the way there's no turning back we will
come here every doggone day if we need
to so be it
all
